name: Steel & Steam: Episode 1
blurb: Steel & Steam is a retro fantasy steampunk JRPG taking place in a large scale world.

rewards.reward: No Reward
HELPER - Receive a WALLPAPER set for your desktop and mobile device. Also, your name will be listed in the end CREDITS under \u201cKickstarter Backers\u201d.
EARLYBIRD - A copy of our GAME plus the previous reward tier, at an early bird cost!
GAMER - A copy of our GAME plus the previous reward tier!
KNOWITALL - All the previous reward tiers plus the PDF walk through and a PDF of the concept art of the game.

HOMESTEAD - All the previous reward tiers, plus have a HOUSE with a personalized plaque in the game.  Anyone who plays Steel & Steam will be able to visit your in-game house, and know that you supported the game with style.

IBEORC -  Same as the - SPRITE - but you are an ORC! All the previous reward tiers, plus own your own NPC (non-player character) in the world. Have a little version of you, based off a template, to live in the world of Steel & Steam.\r\nEstimated delivery: Sep 2013

IBELIZARD - Same as the - SPRITE - but you are a Lizard Folk! All the previous reward tiers, plus own your own NPC (non-player character) in the world. Have a little version of you, based off a template, to live in the world of Steel & Steam.

IBEANIMAL- Same as the - SPRITE - but you are an Animus! All the previous reward tiers, plus own your own NPC (non-player character) in the world. Have a little version of you, based off a template, to live in the world of Steel & Steam.
SPRITE - All the previous reward tiers, plus own your own NPC (non-player character) in the world. Have a little version of you, based off a template, to live in the world of Steel & Steam.

WORKERBEE - SPRITE level and below rewards, your NPC is a worker, they have a job and contribute to the world visually, not just in name. Some examples of NPC\u2019s you can be are miners, fishermen, florists or even a worker at one of the open air market carts.

MERCHANT EPISODE 2 - All the previous reward tiers, plus you get to be an NPC shopkeeper in Steel & Steam. Choose a profession, like a blacksmith or basket weaver, and find yourself owning one of the NPC stores in one of the games towns. Your store will also sport a personalized plaque.

MERCHANT - All the previous reward tiers, plus you get to be an NPC shopkeeper in Steel & Steam.  Choose a profession, like a blacksmith or basket weaver, and find yourself owning one of the NPC stores in one of the games towns.  Your store will also sport a personalized plaque.

WANDERER - SPRITE level and below rewards, your NPC is a wanderer, not stuck to the confines of the city's, randomly wandering the world of Steel & Steam. While traveling the world you have picked up good advice and some helpful items to share with fellow travelers.

WANDERER EPISODE 2 - SPRITE level and below rewards, your NPC is a wanderer, not stuck to the confines of the city's, randomly wandering the world of Steel & Steam. While traveling the world you have picked up good advice and some helpful items to share with fellow travelers.

BLACKSMITH - SPRITE level and below rewards, plus create a LEGENDARY ITEM!\r\n\r\nIf you ever wanted to be so famous they were naming weapons after you, then this is your chance.  Customize the equipment stats and look of your item.  (This reward will be chosen from a pool of weapons.)

BLACKSMITH EPISODE 2 - SPRITE level and below rewards, plus create a LEGENDARY ITEM! If you ever wanted to be so famous they were naming weapons after you, then this is your chance. Customize the equipment stats and look of your item. (This reward will be chosen from a pool of weapons.)

EXPERT - SPRITE level and below rewards, plus you are one of the ultimate shopkeepers, you do not just stick to one town or place, you setup shop where ever the hero\u2019s go.  You are like mobile Cheers, where everyone in the world knows your name.  Even the villains buy sandwiches from your cart.  You and the other Expert are childhood rivals.
STATUESQUE EPISODE 2 - SPRITE level and below rewards, plus have a STATUE of you in one of the game's two towns. You will be remembered in history as that town's local hero!
STATUESQUE - SPRITE level and below rewards, plus have a STATUE of you in one of the game's two towns.  You will be remembered in history as that town's local hero!

MASTER \u2013 SPRITE level and below rewards, plus be the master.  Who started the first INN, who made the first item sale, told the blacksmith how to make his first weapon sale?  You are the Master; the mysterious person who figured out what was needed to help the adventurers throughout the lands of Steel & Steam, and how to sell it to them.  You do not share your wares of knowledge with anyone.  Only those with the spirit and the smarts of an adventurer will be able to find you.

GLADIATOR \u2013 SPRITE level and below rewards, plus you are a battler, a warrior champion of the arena.  You are one of the reasons people go to the games.   Little tykes have posters of you in their rooms.
RIDER - SPRITE level and below rewards, plus be a hero of the past. One of the fabled Riders of Silverhead.  Now statues hidden throughout the world their spirits guarding knowledge of the past.

Monster \u2013 SPRITE level and below rewards, plus you are beast, a monster, and a terror of the lands! Stupid tasty adventurers, you cannot wait to eat them or to steal their treasures.  You will randomly appear in the wilds and cause havoc to those who live in the lands of Steel & Steam
QUESTER EPISODE 2 - SPRITE level and below rewards, plus make you very own QUEST in Steel & Steam (within guidelines provided by RMG Staff)
QUESTER - SPRITE level and below rewards, plus make you very own QUEST in Steel & Steam (within guidelines provided by RMG Staff).

APPRENTICE - SPRITE level and below rewards, plus spend a day making a simple RPG with the President of Red Meat Games, Christo Stassis (aka Steak), and have your game hosted on RMG's website for the world to see.

ADVENTURER - SPRITE level and below rewards, plus be a part of the Steel & Steam story itself!  Join the adventure and create a CUSTOM CHARACTER based on your looks or character design.  We'll work with you to get a representative character in the game, complete with name, story elements and abilities. (Must provide own transport and accommodations to St. John's, NL, but Skype works as well.)
WELLDRESSED - SPRITE level and below rewards, plus own a custom made version of the hero, NOAH'S, TRENCH COAT, made by the crazy awesome people of Abbyshot Clothiers\r\n(www.abbyshot.com)!

LIEUTENANT - ADVENTURER level and below rewards, plus get hugs from Red Meat Games' very own Steak and Pork Belly!  (Also, become listed as a Producer.) Be part of the behind the scenes creative discussions, take home a peronalized and autographed copy of the game, enjoy the WELLDRESSED NOAH'S TRENCH COAT made by the talented folks at Abbyshot Clothiers, and join us in St. John's, NL, Canada for our crazy awesome super fun official launch party, with the craziest meat feast ever!.  (Must provide own transport and accommodations to St. John's, NL for the party.)

SOLDIERCAPTAIN - LIEUTENANT + ADVENTURER level and below rewards, plus get hugs from Red Meat Games' very own Steak and Pork Belly!  (Also, become listed as a Executive Producer.) Be part of the behind the scenes creative discussions, take home a personalized and autographed copy of the game, plus become a major character (Playable Hero or Villain) that is introduced in Episode 2 of Steel & Steam, and threads throughout the rest of the episodes, as well as a unique custom bust of your character, signed by Steak and Pork Belly, enjoy the WELLDRESSED NOAH'S TRENCH COAT made by the talented folks at Abbyshot Clothiers, and join us in St. John's, NL, Canada for our crazy awesome super fun official launch party, with the craziest meat feast ever!.  (Must provide own transport and accommodations to St. John's, NL for the party.)
